1111000110110100 0101000100010111 0 -> sum: 0100001011001011, cout: 1
1110001001101110 1011101111011100 1 -> sum: 1001111001001011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
